NAME: Deepak Pratinidhi
ABOUT: Microsoft Office and O365 business is a $25+ billion franchise. It is also the largest and the fastest growing cloud service with unmatched security and compliance features ready for customers across the globe. Some of the most strategic workloads in O365 are – Exchange, Skype for Business, Information Protection (IP), Work Place Analytics, M365 Security, OneDrive and SharePoint. Microsoft Office India team (@Hyderabad) is building new teams to work on these strategic areas to build the next generation workplace and customer value for some of the largest Enterprises and Governments of the world. Office India team is looking for high caliber and highly motivated full stack Software Engineers to work on scale, performance, availability and security in addition to customer experiences, insights and values. If you have friends or colleagues who are interested in working at Microsoft, please have them write to OPGJobs@microsoft.com.
